title: Misericord (2), 1912-1-1-a,b, early 14th century
creditline: Gift of Architectural League of New York
description: Two roughly rectangular choir seats, each carved on undersurface, with shallow rests supported by: a stooped figure of a bearded man flanked by foliate roundels (-1a); head of a bearded man with flowing hair, flanked by foliate roundles (-1b); each seat with indentations for hinges on lower left and right.
